name: Carmack Moving and Storage Online
overview:
Carmack Moving and Storage is Fairfax County, Virginia’s premiere moving and storage provider, bringing over 28 year’s experience to area residents. With a fully trained staff and state of the art equipment, the team of professionals at Carmack Moving and Storage is ready to tackle any sized move whether in town or around the globe.

Carmack Moving and Storage | Moving Services

Carmack Moving and Storage offers top quality relocation services for residential and commercial clients. The group utilizes a vast network of equipment and the industry’s most courteous labor professionals for each and every job.

Every expert mover at Carmack Moving and Storage has been expressly trained to work efficiently and effectively to ensure a smooth transition. And, Carmack Moving and Storage takes special care with heirlooms and other treasured items. The group is especially skilled and equipped to handle antique vehicles and musical equipment.

Storage Options

Carmack Moving and Storage goes to great lengths to ensure that each crate, box, or free-standing object is marked and inventoried, ensuring their accessibility. With these steps in place, Carmack Moving and Storage can promise a stress-free storage experience. They have a clean, temperature controlled storage facility, with competitive rates and above average customer service.

Carmack Moving and Storage only uses the best materials when palletizing their clients’ precious personal items. With Carmack Moving and Storage’s dedicated record keeping department, constantly monitored grounds, and neatly palletized facility, customers are guaranteed the best storage experience they will ever have.

Staging Services

Realtors and home sellers can take advantage of home staging services presented by Carmack Moving and Storage. Staging services include a free crate and one month of free storage for your crate while your home is on the market.

Carmack Moving and Storage | Additional Services

Carmack Moving and Storage offers expert packing and unpacking services. They can transport furniture, antiques, and other valuable items to their storage facility or directly to the client’s destination. In addition to local moves, Carmack Moving and Storage also offers interstate hauling.

Valuation is provided for each move, which covers damage or loss due to company negligence. Carmack Moving and Storage has a very low claims rate but does suggest purchasing additional valuation to protect against travel related mishaps. Carmack Moving and Storage can facilitate this transaction and will happily help determine an appropriate dollar amount of coverage needed based on the weight of your shipment.

Carmack Moving and Storage provides a Bill of Lading for each project. This document serves as a receipt and clearly outlines Carmack Moving and Storage’s responsibilities and serves to protect the client – many service providers simply quote the job and end their paper trail. The terms and conditions of your contract will be provided for your review prior to your move date.

Additional products and services may be available through prior arrangement with Carmack Moving and Storage.

Costs

Jobs are priced either hourly or per project, based on cargo weight. Carmack Moving and Storage provides free estimates.

About Carmack Moving and Storage

Carmack Moving and Storage has been growing since Rob Carmack got behind the wheel of his first moving truck in 1985. Since then, Carmack Moving and Storage has been proving residents of Northern Virginia, and the entire metro area, the most reliable and professional relocation services available. Rob takes the time to personally connect with each staff member, ensuring they understand his values of reliability and responsibility.

Carmack Moving and Storage is a family-oriented company and strives for 100% satisfaction.

To contact Carmack Moving and Storage for a free, no obligation quote, call them at 703.378.1616 or toll-free at 866.627.4420. You may also email their administrative staff at info@carmackmoving.com. For home staging services, call Julia Silva at 703.378.1616.
